definition: the act of rolling something (as the ball in bowling), to engage in the sport of bowling
details:
noun
- the act of rolling something (as the ball in bowling)
= synonyms: roll
- a dish that is round and open at the top for serving foods
- a round vessel that is open at the top
- a small round container that is open at the top for holding tobacco
= synonyms: pipe bowl
- a wooden ball (with flattened sides so that it rolls on a curved course) used in the game of lawn bowling
- a large ball with finger holes used in the sport of bowling
= synonyms: bowling ball
- a large structure for open-air sports or entertainments
= synonyms: arena, stadium, sports stadium
- the quantity contained in a bowl
= synonyms: bowlful
- a concave shape with an open top
= synonyms: trough
verb
- to engage in the sport of bowling
= example: to engage in the sport of bowling
- to hurl a cricket ball from one end of the pitch towards the batsman at the other end
= example: to hurl a cricket ball from one end of the pitch towards the batsman at the other end
- to roll a ball
= example: to roll a ball
